actions.recommendation: The right eardrum was slightly red and may be due to recent infection. Consult your GP if you develop ear pain.
Old surgical scar on the lower abdomen and small scars on the right knee. Right knee swelling - suggestive of fluid in the joint. Please consult your Orthopaedic surgeon.
To reduce your risk of chronic disease it is ideal to maintain a BMI < 25 and a waist to height ratio < 50%. Start by aiming to lose 10% of your body weight.
See your GP for further investigation on persistent symptoms such as allergies, vitamin deficiencies, or other health concerns.
